sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., a member of the Senate Armed Services Committee, said in an interview that enforcing a no-fly zone would require a level of involvement that he can't support.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: After Zelenskyy speech, Arizona delegation calls for more aid to Ukraine without combat

sentence: One of the stricter bills was introduced in January by Senators Jon Ossoff (D-GA) and Mark Kelly (D-AZ) and includes the legislators’ spouses and dependent children in the restrictions.
author: Cabot Phillips
title: Here’s How Members Of Congress Use Inside Information To Make Millions On The Stock Market

sentence: Joe Manchin of West Virginia and Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly of Arizona — have slammed the administration for lifting Title 42, citing both the ongoing pandemic and an expected migrant influx of up to 170,000 people.
author: Callie Patteson
title: Lawmakers rage as Pentagon says it won’t put troops at Mexico border
